title: Gustav Sjöberg
text: Ivar Gustaf Albert Sjöberg, best known as Gustav Sjöberg (23 March 1913 – 3 October 2003), was a <a href="Sweden">Swedish</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">goalkeeper</a> who played for <a href="AIK%20Fotboll">AIK</a>. He also represented <a href="Sweden%20national%20football%20team">Team Sweden</a> in the <a href="1938%20FIFA%20World%20Cup">1938 FIFA World Cup</a> in France. He was also part of Sweden's squad at the <a href="1936%20Summer%20Olympics">1936 Summer Olympics</a>, but he did not play in any matches.
